history.proof: intros A x y dom₁ dom₂ m₁ m₂ H1 H2. unfold remove. destruct (X.eq_dec x y) as [Heq | Hneq]. - apply eq_sym. shelve. - apply eq_trans with (m₂ := m₁). apply eq_sym. apply eq_sym. apply S.Dom.fold. + shelve. + shelve. + shelve. + shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
∀ (A : Type) (x y : X.t) (dom₁ dom₂ : Dom.t) (m₁ : t A dom₁) (m₂ : t A dom₂), X.eq x y → eq m₁ m₂ → eq (remove A dom₁ x m₁) (remove A dom₂ y m₂)

Premises:
eq : ∀ dom₁ dom₂ : Dom.t, t ?A dom₁ → t ?A dom₂ → Prop where ?A : [ |- Type]
t = S.t : Type → Dom.t → Type Arguments t _%type_scope
remove : ∀ x : Dom.elt, t ?A ?dom → t ?A (Dom.remove x ?dom) where ?A : [ |- Type] ?dom : [ |- Dom.t]
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX → Tauto.GFormula | A : TA → AA → Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula → Tauto.GFormula → Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula → Tauto.GFormula → Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula → Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula → option AF → Tauto.GFormula → Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.N {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.I
Module Dom : (MSetInterface.SetsOn X) with Definition elt := X.t := S.Dom 
add_compat : ∀ (A : Type) (x y : X.t) (v : A) (dom₁ dom₂ : Dom.t) (m₁ : t A dom₁) (m₂ : t A dom₂), X.eq x y → eq m₁ m₂ → eq (add x v m₁) (add y v m₂)
find_compat : ∀ (A : Type) (x y : X.t) (dom₁ dom₂ : Dom.t) (m₁ : t A dom₁) (m₂ : t A dom₂), X.eq x y → eq m₁ m₂ → find x m₁ = find y m₂
eq_sym : ∀ (A : Type) (dom₁ dom₂ : Dom.t) (m₁ : t A dom₁) (m₂ : t A dom₂), eq m₁ m₂ → eq m₂ m₁
set_compat : ∀ (A : Type) (x y : Dom.elt) (v : A) (dom₁ dom₂ : Dom.t) (m₁ : t A dom₁) (m₂ : t A dom₂) (Hin₁ : Dom.In x dom₁) (Hin₂ : Dom.In y dom₂), X.eq x y → eq m₁ m₂ → eq (set x v m₁ Hin₁) (set y v m₂ Hin₂)
eq_trans : ∀ (A : Type) (dom₁ dom₂ dom3 : Dom.t) (m₁ : t A dom₁) (m₂ : t A dom₂) (m3 : t A dom3), eq m₁ m₂ → eq m₂ m3 → eq m₁ m3
incl_trans : ∀ (A : Type) (dom₁ dom₂ dom3 : Dom.t) (m₁ : t A dom₁) (m₂ : t A dom₂) (m3 : t A dom3), incl m₁ m₂ → incl m₂ m3 → incl m₁ m3
*** [ S.cast : ∀ (A : Type) (dom₁ dom₂ : S.Dom.t), S.Dom.eq dom₁ dom₂ → S.t A dom₁ → S.t A dom₂ ] Arguments S.cast {A}%type_scope {dom₁ dom₂}
S.remove_other : ∀ (A : Type) (x y : X.t) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom), ¬ X.eq y x → S.find y (S.remove x m) = S.find y m
S.add_other : ∀ (A : Type) (x y : X.t) (v : A) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom), ¬ X.eq y x → S.find y (S.add x v m) = S.find y m
incl : ∀ dom₁ dom₂ : Dom.t, t ?A dom₁ → t ?A dom₂ → Prop where ?A : [ |- Type]
S.cast_spec_find : ∀ (A : Type) (dom₁ dom₂ : S.Dom.t) (Heq : S.Dom.eq dom₁ dom₂) (m : S.t A dom₁) (x : S.key), S.find x (S.cast Heq m) = S.find x m
S.set_other : ∀ (A : Type) (x y : X.t) (v : A) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom) (Hin : S.Dom.In x dom), ¬ X.eq y x → S.find y (S.set x v m Hin) = S.find y m
S.combine_spec : ∀ (A B C : Type) (f : A → B → C) (g₁ : A → C) (g₂ : B → C) (dom₁ dom₂ : S.Dom.t) (m₁ : S.t A dom₁) (m₂ : S.t B dom₂) (x : S.key) (v : C), S.find x (S.combine f g₁ g₂ m₁ m₂) = Some v ↔ (∃ (v₁ : A) (v₂ : B), S.find x m₁ = Some v₁ ∧ S.find x m₂ = Some v₂ ∧ v = f v₁ v₂) ∨ (∃ v₁ : A, S.find x m₁ = Some v₁ ∧ S.find x m₂ = None ∧ v = g₁ v₁) ∨ (∃ v₂ : B, S.find x m₁ = None ∧ S.find x m₂ = Some v₂ ∧ v = g₂ v₂)
S.combine : ∀ A B C : Type, (A → B → C) → (A → C) → (B → C) → ∀ dom₁ dom₂ : S.Dom.t, S.t A dom₁ → S.t B dom₂ → S.t C (S.Dom.union dom₁ dom₂)
S.singleton_other : ∀ (A : Type) (x y : X.t) (v : A), ¬ X.eq y x → S.find y (S.singleton x v) = None
incl_refl : ∀ (A : Type) (dom : Dom.t), t A dom → Reflexive (incl (dom₂:=dom))
S.Dom.choose_spec3 : ∀ (s s' : S.Dom.t) (x y : S.Dom.elt), S.Dom.choose s = Some x → S.Dom.choose s' = Some y → S.Dom.Equal s s' → X.eq x y
S.Dom.add_spec : ∀ (s : S.Dom.t) (x y : S.Dom.elt), S.Dom.In y (S.Dom.add x s) ↔ X.eq y x ∨ S.Dom.In y s
Inductive InA (A : Type) (eqA : A → A → Prop) (x : A) : list A → Prop := InA_cons_hd : ∀ (y : A) (l : list A), eqA x y → InA eqA x (y :: l) | InA_cons_tl : ∀ (y : A) (l : list A), InA eqA x l → InA eqA x (y :: l) Arguments InA [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments InA_cons_hd [A]%type_scope [eqA]%function_scope [x y] _%list_scope Arguments InA_cons_tl [A]%type_scope [eqA]%function_scope [x] _ [l]%list_scope
S.Dom.remove_spec : ∀ (s : S.Dom.t) (x y : S.Dom.elt), S.Dom.In y (S.Dom.remove x s) ↔ S.Dom.In y s ∧ ¬ X.eq y x
S.Dom.min_elt_spec2 : ∀ (s : S.Dom.t) (x y : S.Dom.elt), S.Dom.min_elt s = Some x → S.Dom.In y s → ¬ X.lt y x
S.Dom.max_elt_spec2 : ∀ (s : S.Dom.t) (x y : S.Dom.elt), S.Dom.max_elt s = Some x → S.Dom.In y s → ¬ X.lt x y
Seq_refl : ∀ (A : Type) (Aeq : relation A), Setoid_Theory A Aeq → ∀ x : A, Aeq x x
fold_left : ∀ A B : Type, (A → B → A) → list B → A → A
S.Dom.fold : ∀ A : Type, (S.Dom.elt → A → A) → S.Dom.t → A → A
S.Dom.singleton_spec : ∀ x y : S.Dom.elt, S.Dom.In y (S.Dom.singleton x) ↔ X.eq y x
add_compat2 : ∀ (A : Type) (x : Dom.elt) (dom : Dom.t), Proper (Logic.eq ==> eq (dom₂:=dom) ==> eq (dom₂:=Dom.add x dom)) (add x)
*** [ X.lt_compat : Proper (X.eq ==> X.eq ==> iff) X.lt ] Expanded type for implicit arguments X.lt_compat : ∀ x y : X.t, X.eq x y → ∀ x0 y0 : X.t, X.eq x0 y0 → (X.lt x x0 → X.lt y y0) ∧ (X.lt y y0 → X.lt x x0) Arguments X.lt_compat [x y] _ [x0 y0]
S.map : ∀ A B : Type, (A → B) → ∀ dom : S.Dom.t, S.t A dom → S.t B dom
*** [ S.find : ∀ (A : Type) (dom : S.Dom.t), S.key → S.t A dom → option A ] Arguments S.find {A}%type_scope {dom}
Inductive NoDupA (A : Type) (eqA : A → A → Prop) : list A → Prop := NoDupA_nil : NoDupA eqA nil | NoDupA_cons : ∀ (x : A) (l : list A), ¬ InA eqA x l → NoDupA eqA l → NoDupA eqA (x :: l) Arguments NoDupA [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments NoDupA_nil [A]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments NoDupA_cons [A]%type_scope [eqA]%function_scope [x] [l]%list_scope
S.remove_same : ∀ (A : Type) (x : S.key) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom), S.find x (S.remove x m) = None
set_compat2 : ∀ (A : Type) (x : key) (dom : Dom.t), Proper (Logic.eq ==> eq (dom₂:=dom) ==> full_relation ==> eq (dom₂:=dom)) (set x)
S.map_spec : ∀ (A B : Type) (f : A → B) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom) (x : S.key) (v : B), S.find x (S.map f m) = Some v ↔ (∃ u : A, S.find x m = Some u ∧ f u = v)
*** [ S.Dom.In_compat : Proper (X.eq ==> Logic.eq ==> iff) S.Dom.In ] Expanded type for implicit arguments S.Dom.In_compat : ∀ x y : X.t, X.eq x y → ∀ x0 y0 : S.Dom.t, x0 = y0 → (S.Dom.In x x0 → S.Dom.In y y0) ∧ (S.Dom.In y y0 → S.Dom.In x x0) Arguments S.Dom.In_compat [x y] _ [x0 y0]
S.add_same : ∀ (A : Type) (x : S.key) (v : A) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom), S.find x (S.add x v m) = Some v
full_relation = λ (A : Type) (_ _ : A), True : ∀ A : Type, relation A Arguments full_relation {A}%type_scope
S.find_spec : ∀ (A : Type) (x : S.key) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom), (∃ v : A, S.find x m = Some v) ↔ S.Dom.In x dom
X.eq_dec : ∀ x y : X.t, {X.eq x y} + {¬ X.eq x y}
S.set_same : ∀ (A : Type) (x : S.key) (v : A) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom) (Hin : S.Dom.In x dom), S.find x (S.set x v m Hin) = Some v

```coq
intros A x y dom₁ dom₂ m₁ m₂ H1 H2.
unfold remove. destruct (X.eq_dec x y) as [Heq | Hneq].
- subst. rewrite H2. apply eq_sym. apply remove_same.
- apply eq_trans with (m₂ := m₁). apply eq_sym. apply remove_other. assumption.
  apply eq_sym. apply IHm₁.
Qed. 
Qed.```

original: intros A x y dom₁ dom₂ m₁ m₂ H1 H2. unfold remove. destruct (X.eq_dec x y) as [Heq | Hneq]. - subst. rewrite H2. apply eq_sym. apply remove_same. - apply eq_trans with (m₂ := m₁). apply eq_sym. apply remove_other. auto. apply eq_sym. apply IHm₁.
